lore: The Shadow in the Warp radiating from this immensely powerful psyker-analogue creeps in all directions, driving even non-psychic prey organisms to screaming madness. As its foes writhe in agony, the Neurotyrant guides the swarms around it to slaughter with brutal efficiency.

otherAbilities.name: Node Lash (Psychic)
otherAbilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. If the target is Battle-shocked, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

otherAbilities.name: Psychic Terror (Psychic)
otherAbilities.description: If one or more models from your army with this ability are on the battlefield when you unleash the Shadow in the Warp, subtract 1 from the Battle-shock test each enemy unit on the battlefield must take as a result.

otherAbilities.name: Neuroloids
otherAbilities.description: In your Command phase, you can select up to two friendly TYRANIDS units within 18'' of this modelâ€™s unit. Until the start of your next Command phase, the selected units are always considered to be within Synapse Range of your army.
